DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine two formulation diphenhydramine hydrochloride bioequivalent .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Between Two Oral Formulations Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects require observe ten-hour fast one-hour fluid restriction prior dosing period . Subjects randomize one two active treatment group , receive supervised dose treatment approximately eight ounce water , require maintain fluid restriction one hour treatment . Following one-hour post-dose fluid restriction , subject could drink water , consumer food fluid four hour post-dose . Following seven-day washout period , comparison treatment administer accord procedure .
DOC.criteria: healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive approximately 18 30 kg/m2 BMI total body weight least 55 kg ( 121 lb ) able understand sign write Informed Consent Form willing follow protocol requirement comply protocol restriction pregnant lactate woman woman childbearing potential use acceptable form contraception 3 month prior first dose completion followup procedure history allergy , sensitivity , and/or idiosyncratic reaction Benadryl , diphenhydramine hydrochloride , diphenhydramine citrate evidence clinical , dietary psychiatric deviation normal could increase risk subject research staff interfere interpretation study result use licit illicit drug participate trial within specified number day prior first dose trial treatment
